dc:title: A Reminiscence at 75
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reminiscence on her conversion years, comments on her orthodoxy, and expresses her gratitude to Commonweal.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 137 1973-08-10 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
